byline.original: By SHERYL GAY STOLBERG and STEPHEN BABCOCK
byline.contributor: Ashley Southall contributed reporting from New York.

lead_paragraph: A largely peaceful protest over the death of Mr. Gray while in police custody turned chaotic on Saturday night after demonstrators smashed a store’s window and damaged police cruisers.

headline.print_headline: Scenes of Chaos as Baltimore Crowd Protests Death in Police Custody
headline.main: Scenes of Chaos in Baltimore as Thousands Protest Freddie Gray’s Death

snippet: A largely peaceful protest over the death of Mr. Gray while in police custody turned chaotic on Saturday night after demonstrators smashed a store’s window and damaged police cruisers.
abstract: Peaceful protest in Baltimore over death of Freddie Gray, black man who was injured while in police custody, devolves into violent riot after small group breaks off and engages in rampage.
